content.rendered:
[et_pb_section bb_built=”1″ admin_label=”section”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

We’ve had an exciting year at ClinLab, and it’s had everything to do with our amazing clients and partners. We look forward to a great 2018!

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_video admin_label=”Video” src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ClinLab_2017_360p.mp4″] [/et_pb_video][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
